categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Rebel Alliance Painting Contest was an art contest that occurred twice in 1 ABY.

After Emperor Palpatine announced details concerning the planned Galactic Empire Painting Contest, the Rebel Alliance responded by holding their own contest. The Alliance challeneged all painters who were sympathetic to the Rebellion to create the greatest Rebellion masterpiece ever, and submit it for possible selection.
The first painting selected under this contest was titled, The March To Restuss. Later, another contest was enacted, where the painting Preparing for the Storm was selected.
The Rebel Alliance Painting Contest was featured in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, as part of its "Create a Painting Contest."
